title: Alexander Grawe
text:
I am a PhD student at the Berlin School of Economics and DIW Berlin. I completed my undergraduate at the Free University of Berlin and an MPhil at Tinbergen Institute in Amsterdam.
My research interests are in applied microeconomics with a focus on labor, education, and inequality.

title: CV
text: You can download a PDF copy of my CV here.

title: Research
text: My research interestes lie in applied microeconomics with a focus on labor economics, the economics of education, and economic inequality.
